snippet: As carriers across Europe face more competition, the airline also has to cope with the effect of a three-day strike in April.
abstract: Lufthansa sharply reduces its profit forecasts for the next two years, citing slower than expected recovery in demand for its passenger and cargo services, as well as fallout from widespread strikes early in 2014.
lead_paragraph: As carriers across Europe face more competition, the airline also has to cope with the effect of a three-day strike in April.

headline.main: Lufthansa Trims Profit Forecast for 2 Years
headline.print_headline: Lufthansa Trims Profit Forecast for 2 Years
